title: Steamed Corn on the Cob

ingredients.content: 6 ears of corn, husks and silk removed and ends trimmed

preparations.content: Place water into mixing bowl. Place corn into Varoma dish. Place Varoma into position, secure lid and steam <b>20 min/Varoma/speed 3<b>. Set Varoma dish on inverted Varoma lid and serve immediately or serve in a casserole dish.

hintsAndTricks: Corn drizzled in melted butter: place cooked corn on a serving dish then place 3 oz of diced butter onto hot corn. Sprinkle with freshly ground black pepper and fine sea salt and rotate corn a few times making sure all corn pieces are covered with butter.
